original_text: Tobiah the Ammonite was with him. Tobiah said, ‘The wall that the Jews are trying to build is very weak. Even if a little fox climbs up on it, the stones would all fall down again!’
korean_text: 암몬 사람 도비야는 곁에 있다가 이르되 그들이 건축하는 돌 성벽은 여우가 올라가도 곧 무너지리라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Tobiah the Ammonite was with him
sentences.korean_translation: 암몬 사람 도비아가 그와 함께 있었다

sentences.original_text: The wall that the Jews are trying to build is very weak
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인들이 짓고 있는 그 벽은 매우 약하다

sentences.original_text: Even if a little fox climbs up on it
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 여우 한 마리라도 그 위에 올라가기만 하면

sentences.original_text: the stones would all fall down again
sentences.korean_translation: 그 돌들이 모두 다시 무너져 내릴 것이다
